name: Kotty's basics demo (baldi's basics demo mod)
name_original: Kotty's basics demo (baldi's basics demo mod)
description:
Kotty's basics demo (baldi's basics demo mod) is a game developed by kit games. It came out on 18-07-2021.
You can play Kotty's basics demo (baldi's basics demo mod) on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
